definitions.definition: A person directly involved in a creative marketing process.
Artistic material used in advertising, e.g. photographs, drawings, or video.
definitions.example: I've included in my portfolio all the creative I've completed in my five year design career.

definitions.definition: Tending to create things, or having the ability to create; often, excellently, in a novel fashion, or any or all of these.
definitions.example: a creative dramatist who avoids cliche

definitions.definition: (of a created thing) Original, expressive and imaginative.
definitions.example: a creative new solution to an old problem

definitions.definition: A type of set of natural numbers, related to mathematical logic.
Designed or executed to deceive or mislead.
